response.overview: The Bandit goes on another cross-country run, transporting an elephant from Florida to Texas. And, once again, Sheriff Buford T. Justice is on his tail.
response.tagline: The Bandit is back and better than ever!
response.title: Smokey and the Bandit II

titles.title: Ein ausgekochtes Schlitzohr ist wieder auf Achse

Smokey and the Bandit Ride Again

cast.name: Jackie Gleason
cast.character: Sheriff Buford T. Justice / Gaylord Justice / Reginald Van Justice
